Title: Episode Six
Plot:
The gang begin to realize that Penny is failing as a teacher. Jenny sees it as a reflection on her mentoring but then Penny tries to get around her by flirting with Bob throwing him into full mid-life crises mode. A trip to the hospital and a word from Brian helps Bob's put his mid-life crisis and Penny's manipulative ways into perspective.
Kurt is also forced to have a word with Penny when a student complains that her flirting with him in class is no substitute for teaching the material.
